name: The Projectories of Daṇḍin: Episode 4 - Fire and Dust
name_original: The Projectories of Daṇḍin: Episode 4 - Fire and Dust
description:
For MAC and PC!

Yes, hello, this is the Projectories of Dandin - Episode 4. Did you miss episodes 1-3? That is no problem - they were never released. This is the fourth episode - the one that got a little game to go with it. 

Not so much as a game as a ludic experience. 

You the protagonist are set to endure a little service with a few other characters. Can you make it through?

Notes:

This game was developed to accompany the 67th release of the Manifest Lexicon (https://dandin.bandcamp.com/). The audio version of this release includes the audio from the lecture in the game, while the game release here is an entire game world that can be interacted with during a service where that lecture is played.

I'm working on more simulations to accompany audio recordings; this episode is just the beginning!
